name: Chef John's Green Goddess Dressing
author: Chef John
summary: This creamy, herby, addictively delicious sauce is not only my favorite salad dressing, but is one of my favorite dips as well. You can of course tweak the acidity with more or less lemon, as well as play with the salt and pepper, but please do not change the trio of herbs. The way the parsley and chive play against the sweet tarragon makes this unlike any other herb dressing.
ingredients: ⅓ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, or more to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Blend mayonnaise, sour cream, parsley, tarragon, chives, lemon juice, rice vinegar, anchovy fillet, garlic, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper in a blender until smooth
